overview: This file controls the list of strings that are randomly selected to be used as the suffix part of the name when generating Rare items  Rare Suffixes are chosen at random from the list define in the data file  These item affixes will appear at the end of a Rare itemâ€™s name

data_fields.name: name
data_fields.description: Uses a string key to define the Rare Suffix name

data_fields.name: version
data_fields.description: Defines which game version to use this Set bonus (0 = Classic mode | 100 = Expansion mode)

data_fields.name: itype1 (to itype7)
data_fields.description: Controls what item types are allowed for this Rare Suffix to spawn on (Uses the ID field from ItemTypes.txt)

data_fields.name: etype1 (to etype4)
data_fields.description: Controls what item types are excluded for this Rare Suffix to spawn on (Uses the ID field from ItemTypes.txt)
